content: Your AI Journey Doesn‚Äôt Start with Models ‚Äî It Starts with Dirty Data.Everyone wants AI. Few are ready for it. Why? Because their data is a mess.In 2025, the smartest enterprises aren‚Äôt just building models ‚Äî they‚Äôre cleaning house:Here‚Äôs how they‚Äôre starting:1Ô∏è‚É£ Use Case First, Data Second AI isn‚Äôt a data science problem. It‚Äôs a business problem. Define impact first.2Ô∏è‚É£ Discover What You Actually Have Data catalogs. Profiling. Lineage. Know your shadow systems before they shadow your results.3Ô∏è‚É£ Resolve the Mess Duplicates. Nulls. Stale records. Conflicting truths. Start with ‚ÄúWho owns what?‚Äù4Ô∏è‚É£ Automate + Validate Use AI to clean data for AI. Add humans where accuracy is non-negotiable.5Ô∏è‚É£ Monitor Like a Product Bad data will creep back in. Set quality KPIs. Don‚Äôt let it.If your data isn't trusted, your AI isn't real. Data cleaning isn‚Äôt sexy ‚Äî but it‚Äôs survival.‚Äîüí¨ How are you preparing your data for AI? Curious to hear real-world tactics. hashtag#DataQuality hashtag#AIReadiness hashtag#EnterpriseAI hashtag#DigitalTransformation hashtag#DataGovernance hashtag#GenAI hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#CXOInsights hashtag#DirtyData hashtag#AIatScale
